goal.ch: 這門課是為喜好藝術和非虛構寫作的大學生所開設，學習如何書寫有實質內涵和簡明順暢的解析性和評論性文章。透過範例討論和實作練習，本課程協助學生對視覺藝術有基本的瞭解，將美學體驗中的複雜反應轉化為思維、落實為文字，並建立引人共鳴的論點。學生將能增進觀察和描述作品的能力，培養批判性思考，提升文字溝通表達的效果。課程有四個主要單元：首先閱讀藝術家的書寫，關注創作者的自述、作品構思演變之間的關係。接著聚焦在美學經驗、形式分析和風格辨識的養成訓練，以及認識藝術批評的意義。本課程亦結合藝文中心和美術館實地教學，引領同學沈浸於藝術的體驗和撰寫展覽評論的技巧。最後，課程指引藝術史研究的基本方法，帶領學生實作藝術史書寫的必備過程和研究要點。
goal.en: This course is designed for the students who love art and non-fiction writing. Students will learn how to write substantial and concise essays. Through concrete examples and hands-on practices, students will possess basic understanding of art, and have ability of turning complex responses to art into thinking and words, establishing convincing arguments. Students will be able to observe and describe works of art, and develop critical thinking, and enhance linguistic communication. This course is divided into four units. First, we read artists‘ writings and analyze the relationship between their visual works and written expressions. Second, we focus on formal analysis and stylistic identification, and understand the meanings of criticism and the effects of interpretation. Third, we visit the university art center and art museum in person, immersed in artistic experience, and become familiar with the skills of writing exhibition reviews. Lastly, we learn the basic methods of studying art history, and understand the research process essential to build sound arguments.
